example_sentence_en: The mother is cooking in the kitchen.
example_sentence_de: Die Mutter kocht in der Küche.

example_sentence_en: The father is working in the office.
The child is playing in the garden.
I buy fresh bread at the store.
example_sentence_de: Ich kaufe frisches Brot im Laden.

example_sentence_en: I drink fresh milk for breakfast.
example_sentence_de: Ich trinke frische Milch zum Frühstück.

example_sentence_en: Tomorrow I will go to the store.
example_sentence_de: Morgen gehe ich in den Laden.

example_sentence_en: My grandfather works in the garden.
I eat chicken meat for dinner.
I drink coffee in the morning.
I drink tea in the evening.
There are seven days in a week.
example_sentence_de: Es gibt sieben Tage in einer Woche.

example_sentence_en: I wake up at eight o'clock.
example_sentence_de: Ich wache um acht Uhr auf.

example_sentence_en: I go running in the morning.
My dog is big and friendly.
example_sentence_de: Mein Hund ist groß und freundlich.

example_sentence_en: We watch TV in the living room.
There is a shower in the bathroom.
example_sentence_de: Im Badezimmer gibt es eine Dusche.

example_sentence_en: We have lunch in the dining room.
example_sentence_de: Wir essen im Eßzimmer zu Mittag.

example_sentence_en: I park the car in the garage.
example_sentence_de: Ich parke das Auto in der Garage.

example_sentence_en: I store things in the attic.
example_sentence_de: Ich lagere Dinge auf dem Dachboden.

example_sentence_en: I greet guests in the hall.
example_sentence_de: Ich begrüße die Gäste im Flur.

example_sentence_en: There is food on the table.
There are clothes in the cupboard.
There is food in the fridge.
I wash in the washing machine.
I vacuum with the vacuum cleaner.
I brush my teeth with the toothbrush.
example_sentence_de: Ich putze meine Zähne mit der Zahnbürste.

example_sentence_en: I brush my teeth with toothpaste.
example_sentence_de: Ich putze meine Zähne mit Zahnpasta.

example_sentence_en: There is a shower in the bathroom.
example_sentence_de: Im Badezimmer gibt es eine Dusche.

example_sentence_en: I look at myself in the mirror.
example_sentence_de: Ich schaue mich im Spiegel an.
